couponTitle: Panera Bread Discount Code: Save $5 Orders $15+
couponDescription: Shop at Panera Bread and get $5 discount on orders over $15. Apply this discount code at checkout.

couponTitle: Panera Bread Discount Code: 15% Off Your Purchase
couponDescription: Receive 15% off catering orders over $175+ on your shopping cart when you apply Panera Bread's coupon code at checkout.

couponTitle: Panera Bread Discount Code: Extra 25% Off Your Order
couponDescription: Apply this promotional code during checkout to get an additional 25% off your eligible purchase.

couponTitle: Take 15% Off Your Purchase
couponDescription: Save up to 15% on catering order when you spend $200 and more at Panera Bread.

couponTitle: $5 Subscription on Your Order
couponDescription: Shop and get 4 months of monthly subscription for $5 using a promo code on your cart.

couponTitle: Panera Bread Coupon Code: Take 1% Off  Fundraising Donation
couponDescription: Enter this Panera Bread coupon code at checkout and receive a 1% discount on fundraising donation.

couponTitle: Buy 1 Get 1 Free Breakfast Entree
couponDescription: Buy one breakfast entree and get one free. Apply this coupon code at checkout.

couponTitle: Panera Bread Discount Code: Up to 15% Off Your Order
couponDescription: Shop and take up to 15% off your purchase using a promo code on your cart.

couponTitle: Panera Bread Coupon: 15% Off Your Purchase
couponDescription: Shop and save 15% with this promo code for $200+ catering orders at Panera Bread.

couponTitle: Get $2 Off $10 Online Purchase
couponDescription: Score up to $2 off $10 or more online purchase at Panera Bread.

couponTitle: Panera Bread Promo Code: Up to 15% Off Your Order
couponDescription: Shop and take up 15% off your purchase worth $200 or more using a promo code at checkout.

couponTitle: Panera Bread Discount Code: $30 Off Orders $150 or More
couponDescription: Get $30 off your next Panera Bread catering order of $150 or more. this is perfect for any event or gathering. Enjoy fresh and delicious food at a great discount.

couponTitle: Free Shipping using Coupon Code
couponDescription: Get free shipping with this Panera Bread discount code when used at checkout.

couponTitle: Panera Bread Promo Code: Get Free 3 Months of Sip Club
couponDescription: Redeem this promo code at checkout and get free three months of sip club.

couponTitle: Take $3 Off Your Order
couponDescription: Save $3 on your entire purchase in the store.

couponTitle: Panera Bread Coupon: Get Cup Of Soup For Just $1
couponDescription: Take a cup of soup for just $1 with an entree when your purchase on the app at Panera Bread.

couponTitle: Panera Bread Promo Code: $10 Off Your Order
couponDescription: Receive $10 off eligible items on your $15+ purchase with this discount code at Panera Bread.

couponTitle: 15% Off Your Order
couponDescription: Shop and take 15% off your order worth $200 or more using a coupon code at checkout.

couponTitle: Panera Bread Coupon: Up to 10% Off Your Order
couponDescription: When this promo code is applied at checkout, you can take up to 10% off your qualifying purchase.

couponTitle: Save Up to 15% on Catering Orders $200+
couponDescription: Shop at Panera Bread and get up to a 15% discount on catering orders of $200 or more. Apply this discount code at checkout.
